functions.description: Provides live stock updates for SAS Online. e.g. ticker("NSE", 26000, "CompactMarketDataMessage", "excel")
functions.name: TICKER

parameters.description: URL of Chart Page taken from SAS Online
parameters.name: chartUrl

parameters.description: Name of exchange like NSE, Check __exchange_codes
parameters.name: exchangeName

parameters.description: Token code of scrip
parameters.name: instrumentToken

parameters.description: Type of subscription like CompactMarketDataMessage
parameters.name: subscriptionType

parameters.description: Location of subscription like app-navbar
parameters.name: subscriptionLocation

functions.description: Allows importing json data and flatten it into tabular format
functions.name: IMPORTJSON

parameters.description: URL to post/fetch data
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: Response Json key to check for success response
parameters.name: successField

parameters.description: Value of Response Json key to check for success response
parameters.name: successFieldValue

parameters.description: Array from response JSON to flatten into table
parameters.name: flattenArrayPath

parameters.description: URL Query string for which repeated api calls need to be made
parameters.name: queryParam

parameters.description: String value, seperated by ";", of URL Query string for which repeated api calls need to be made
parameters.name: queryParamValues

functions.description: Allows accessing api and flattens returned json data into tabular format
functions.name: WEBAPIREQUEST

parameters.description: URL to post/fetch data
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: HttpMethod
parameters.name: method

parameters.description: Body of the request if POST call
parameters.name: requestBody

parameters.description: Array from response JSON to flatten into table
parameters.name: flattenArrayPath

parameters.description: Object key from response JSON to flatten
parameters.name: flattenObjPath

parameters.description: Access Token if accessing secured endpoint
parameters.name: authToken

parameters.description: Message for confirmation
parameters.name: confirmationMessage

functions.description: Search for products that match a given substring. Try =SCRIPTLAB.DATATYPESCUSTOMFUNCTIONS.PRODUCTSEARCH("chef", false).
functions.name: PRODUCTSEARCH

parameters.description: The string to search for in the sample JSON data.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Define whether the search should be a match of the whole product name or part of the product name. If omitted, completeMatch = false.
parameters.name: completeMatch
